ComicInfo.Summary:
Death of an Exorcist: A warlock makes a deal with Satan to try to trick John Peters into killing himself.
Over My Dead Body: Dr. Mowbray needs fresher corpses to continue his research.
The Fear Master: When Dr. Vincent Adler dies suddenly, his assistant Harold Jukes steals his last invention, a ray that causes instant fear, and embarks on a crime spree.
Bewitched for a Day: Henry believes that a strange little man has granted his wish to change his life, but it's just a prank played by his wife and a hidden camera TV show.
The Riddle of the Glass Bubble: A mysterious globe arrives on Earth and will destroy the planet in 12 days unless a way is found to deactivate it.
Panic in the Dark: When a burglar breaks in, the squirrels that Ben has been feeding come to his rescue.
The Wizard of the Diamond World: Professor Hugh Ordway uses an experimental ray to travel to another world inside a diamond atom where he helps a beautiful queen against a usurper who uses primitive science. After returning to his lab he wants to go back, but finds that time passes differently on the diamond world, and the civilization he found there is long gone.
Doom Was My Inheritance: Adam Lake takes a challenge to reach Simon Horst's emerald mine, 20 miles into the jungle.
The Man Who Was Death!: Fred Jones believes that his touch causes death.
Rest in Pieces: Tim makes his own tombstone, complete with date of death.
The Unlucky Birthstones: A cursed bracelet of birthstones causes disaster for whoever holds the bracelet during the month of their birth.
The Enchanted Costumes: Three enchanted costumes cause their wearers to experience the same fate as the costume's original owner.
Among Us Dwells a Man-Beast: A werewolf is on the loose.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,George Kashdan,Carl Wessler,Murray Boltinoff
